name: Window Watcher (GMTK 2019)
description:
Window Watcher was made in GameMaker Studio 2 in 48 hrs for GMTK GameJam 2019 with the theme "Only One".

You have only one minute, only one level, and only one objective - to count how many windows are lit up before the timer runs out! Try your best to get the highest grade possible! This is the first GameJam I've participated in and I really enjoyed taking part and hope you like it! 

Any feedback is appreciated!

Controls:

X - Start and count up

Z - Count down

ESC - Quit on score screen

Update:

Version 2.0 is now live.

After some feedback, it seemed people preferred to have the counter only increment when you press the key, and then have to wait until you press it again to repeatedly do so. This therefore allows you to only hit it when you count a window, allowing you to focus on counting rather than making sure the number is correct!
